404.title: 404 Page Not Found
404.subtext_html: The page you requested does not exist. Click here to continue shopping.

password_page.signup_form_success: We will send you an email right before we open!
password_page.admin_link_html: Are you the store owner? Log in here
password_page.powered_by_shopify_html: This shop will be powered by {{ shopify }}

forms.post_error: Sorry, looks like something went wrong. Please correct the following and submit again:

search.no_results_html: Your search for "{{ terms }}" did not yield any results.
search.results_for_html: Your search for "{{ terms }}" revealed the following:
search.title: Search for products on our site

comments.title: Leave a comment
comments.name: Name
comments.moderated: Please note, comments must be approved before they are published
comments.success_moderated: Your comment was posted successfully. We will publish it in a little while, as our blog is moderated.
comments.success: Your comment was posted successfully! Thank you!

general.title: Cart
general.empty: It appears that your cart is currently empty!
general.taxes_extra: Shipping, taxes, and discounts will be calculated at checkout.

shipping_calculator.title: Shipping rates calculator
shipping_calculator.single_rate: There is one shipping rate available for
shipping_calculator.no_rates: We do not ship to this destination.

form.name: Name
form.post_success: Thanks for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

activate_account.title: Activate Account
activate_account.subtext: Create your password to activate your account.

login.title: Customer Login
login.guest_note_html:
You don't have an account yet, but wish to create one?
Check out as a guest, and you will be able to create an account on your order confirmation page.

orders.title: Order History
orders.none: You haven't placed any orders yet.

recover_password.title: Reset Password
recover_password.subtext: We will send you an email to reset your password.
recover_password.success: An email has been sent containing password reset instructions.

register.title: Create Account
register.subtext: New to {{ shop_name }}? Sign up for a free account

onboarding.no_collections_html: You don't have any collections to show here. Add some collections to go along with the default Home page.
onboarding.no_linklist_html:
There are no collections in your {{ link_list_title }} link list.

Either add collections to your {{ link_list_title }} link list by browsing to your Navigation page, or choose a different link list in your theme settings in the Home → Module: Collection List section.
onboarding.no_other_collections_html:
There are no collections in your store other than your Home page collection and Catalog that have products in them.

Add some products to your collections.

footer.contact_module_text_html: Shopify Store Attn: Online Department 16 W 19th Street New York 10011 Phone: (555) 555-5678
footer.about_module_text_html: This is a freshly installed Shopify store. You haven't inputted any "About" information yet and so if it looks naked, that's because it is! Jump into the theme settings and personalize away. You can edit this text in the Footer section.
footer.newsletter_tagline: We promise to only send you good things.

notify.thanks_text: Thanks! We will notify you when this product becomes available!
notify.click_to_notify: Click here to be notified by email when this product becomes available.
notify.valid_email: Please provide a valid email address.

issued.title: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!
issued.redeem: Use this code at check out to redeem your gift card
